Trump raises concerns about US ban on TikTokPresidential candidate Donald Trump raised concerns about banning TikTok ahead of a vote next week by the U.S. House of Representatives that would give TikTok owner ByteDance about six months to divest the popular short video app. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 16:03:27 GMT LF7JWBWIIBLEFOOWUG6IG35IRY https://www.reuters.com/technology/trump-raises-concerns-about-us-ban-tiktok-2024-03-08/David Shepardson技术
Germany's federal prosecutor investigates Tesla arson attackGermany's federal prosecutors office has taken over the investigation into an arson attack that has cut power supplies to Tesla's German plant near Berlin, looking into charges of terrorism. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 15:39:27 GMT YGLJIVKWVNJOZIDSBVFTXFFIJI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germany-federal-prosecutor-investigates-tesla-arson-attack-2024-03-08/Reuters世界欧洲
No deal with striking unions, says Finland's prime ministerFinland's prime minister said on Friday he had failed to persuade trade unions to call off planned strike action triggered by the government's labour market reforms, extending an ongoing conflict. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 15:38:58 GMT 5ORHZWGKH5NSXJZN6BYHSOS2ZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/no-deal-with-striking-unions-says-finland-prime-minister-2024-03-08/Essi Lehto商业工作世界
United-operated Boeing 737 MAX rolls off Houston runway, says FAAA United Airlines Boeing 737 MAX rolled onto the grass when exiting the runway at George Bush Airport in Houston early Friday, the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) said. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 15:33:38 GMT BZ3FGERTYNPS7E6XFEFUOCYXQA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/united-operated-boeing-737-rolls-off-houston-runway-passengers-deplaned-says-faa-2024-03-08/Reuters世界美国
Israeli officials mull arming some Gaza civilians as aid security crumbles-reportIsraeli officials have discussed arming some civilians in Gaza to provide security protection for aid convoys into the besieged enclave, as part of wider planning for humanitarian supplies after fighting ends, the Israel Hayom daily said on Friday. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 15:14:00 GMT XQ3XVMXBIFNAZHSZRN5DTSX7OU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-officials-mull-arming-some-gaza-civilian-aid-security-crumbles-report-2024-03-08/Reuters世界中东地区
Argentina inflation seen cooling as Milei austerity tempers food pricesArgentina's monthly inflation reading likely slowed to 15.3% in February, still painfully high but down sharply from a peak in December, as new libertarian President Javier Milei's austerity drive squeezes shoppers, helping rein in grocery price rises. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 14:55:21 GMT HONWJNR3BRJS5JZQMIFXXTY2SQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentina-inflation-seen-cooling-miles-austerity-tempers-food-prices-2024-03-08/Walter Bianchi世界美洲
India deports first group of Myanmar refugees who fled 2021 coupIndia has deported the first group of Myanmar refugees who entered the country while fleeing a military coup in 2021, the top minister of a border state said on Friday, weeks after India ended a visa-free border policy with Myanmar. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 14:49:15 GMT 7UPHYSJSVK5PRZHLNTFNQW53FUM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/india-deports-first-group-myanmar-refugees-who-fled-2021-coup-2024-03-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Poland to lodge complaint over former government's loss of EU fundsA Polish parliamentary commission will inform prosecutors of a possible crime connected with the former government's failure to apply for EU funds, ruling coalition lawmaker Roman Giertych was quoted as saying by state news agency PAP. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 14:40:25 GMT UZJSMA44V5OGNBUKDS3B576NOY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-lodge-complaint-with-prosecutors-over-forms-government-losing-eu-funds-2024-03-08/Reuters世界欧洲
No International Women's Day in Gaza, say mothers of hungry childrenWomen's Day? At a tent in Rafah where Um Zaki said she was boiling porridge on an open flame to stave off the hunger of her six children, the holiday passed as a cruel joke. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 14:11:56 GMT KQCFXOQVPZOVXBOZXD4H5OKFYU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/no-women-day-gaza-say-mothers-hungry-children-2024-03-08/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
U.N. expert on torture examines treatment of Palestinian detaineesThe United Nations expert on torture said on Friday she was investigating allegations of torture and mistreatment of Palestinian detainees in Israel, and was in talks to visit the country. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 13:43:14 GMT GPRFXC3PPBKWTEAW6OGM2HTW6I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-torture-expert-examines-treatment-of-palestinian-detainees-2024-03-08/Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber世界中东地区
Gambian ex-minister alleges racism and lies as Swiss crimes against humanity trial closesSwitzerland's first full trial of crimes against humanity concluded this week, with the defendant, a former Gambian minister accused of rape and murder, giving a defiant closing speech in which he claimed to be a victim of racism and lies. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 13:13:23 GMT LAHCMVO6N5JFXHJ5GATDO5B5F4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/gambian-ex-minister-alleged-racism-lies-swiss-crimes-against-Humanity-Trial-2024-03-08/Emma Farge世界欧洲
